searchCard.title: I know what I want to eat
searchCard.content: Show me restaurant recommendations for a specific dish.

nearbyCard.title: I'm not sure where to start

aboutPage.p1: Washoku walker is an app that lets you find quality Japanese food (washoku) near you.
aboutPage.p2: If you're familiar with Japanese food and know what you want, you can find restaurants by cusine. Not sure what you want? We'll find a few highly rated restaurants nearby.
aboutPage.p3: In either case, Washoku Walker searches within a 1.5 km radius to get you the best Japanese food we can find.
